original: intros. unfold inductive_invariant, composed_invariant. split. - unfold state_invariant. intros. split. + apply True_intro. + intros. split. * apply True_intro. * apply True_intro. - intros. split. + intros. inversion H; subst. * destruct p as [net net' p]. simpl in *. subst. unfold composed_invariant in H1. destruct H1 as [H1 _]. apply H1. * destruct p as [h net net' out inp d0 d' l tr]. simpl in *. subst. unfold composed_invariant in H2. destruct H2 as [_ [H2 _]]. apply H2. + intros. inversion H; subst. * destruct p as [net net' p]. simpl in *. subst. unfold composed_invariant in H1. destruct H1 as [H1 _]. apply H1. * destruct p as [h net net' out inp d0 d' l tr]. simpl in *. subst. unfold composed_invariant in H2. destruct H2 as [_ [_ H2]]. apply H2.
